query: Could you plan a 7-day travel itinerary for a group of 4, starting in San Diego and visiting 3 cities in Arizona from March 6th to March 12th, 2022? Our budget is set at $12,100. We require accommodations with a house rule permitting visitors and where we can have entire rooms for ourselves. We will be avoiding flights during this trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Prescott,Flagstaff,Yuma]
